channel.title: The better way to make a flamethrower
channel.description:
materials needed
1 a bar about 3 cm thick and 1 foot long 2 a water gun (must shoot steady beams of water not to hard.) 3 tape or super glue 4 lighter (preferable one of those lighters where it is hard to make the flame go out. 5 gasoline
ok
super glue or tape the small bar right under where the water gun shoots out. now superglue or tape the lighter to the end of it.
next find a way to make the lighter stay lit. example super glue the ignition thing down
next fill the gun up with gasoline. pump up the gun and shoot it.
note that these flames can reach up to 10 feet.

item.title: The better way to make a flamethrower
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:

next find a way to make the lighter stay lit. example super glue the ignition thing down
